author: nielpio
title: Would rather lock guests outside than pay for more staff
text: Just got back into our hotel after waiting outside in the cold for about 7 min at 11:15pm (23:15), other guests also gathered with us standing outside hoping someone would have the courtesy to let their paying guests in. Then when he clerk finally came, offered no apologies and acted like this was acceptable at a 4 star hotel. To add insult to injury he started to argue with me about the length of time he was absent from the desk. Completely unacceptable. Avoid this hotel if if you want to go out after sunset.
